Description.Name: Defender MG Ammo 2x
Description.Details:
Capacity: 200 rounds.

Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type.  Most Ammo Bins will explode and destroy their installed location when they receive a Critical Hit, however Defender Machine Gun ammunition is stored in shielded sections to avoid this issue.  Defender Machine Gun ammunition can be struck, dropped, and even set on fire and it will not explode and in some cases still be usable, thanks to patented Westonmach technology and how the rounds are designed.

Defender Machine Gun Ammo 2x Bins each contain 200 rounds and may feed multiple weapons, which do not have to be installed in the same location, thanks to a 'Mechs internal mechanisms which feed and transfer ammunition around inside of a 'Mech's parts, like any other ammunition bins.
